00004  * This is band matrix solver from LAPACK MP Connection
00005  *
00006  * Note that the class does not work due to the MSWell integration,
00007  * there is no a seperate class LapackBandSolver for 2P & MP
00008  *
00009  * Need to create LapackBandSolver class for 2P & MP if you want to 
00010  * make it work nicely!

00012  * Created    07/27/00          hcao     
00013  */
00014
